org.foxlabs.validation

Class Validator.ContextBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.foxlabs.validation.Validator.ContextBuilder
  • Enclosing class:
    Validator<T>

    public class Validator.ContextBuilder
extends Object
    This builder allows to perform validation operations with custom parameters.
    Author:
    Fox Mulder

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      protected ContextBuilder()
      Constructs default ContextBuilder.
      protected ContextBuilder(ValidationContext<?> parent)
      Constructs a new ContextBuilder for cascade validation.
